meanings.def: to show something clearly, especially a feeling, an attitude or a quality
examples: Social tensions were manifested in the recent political crisis.

meanings.def: to appear or become easy to notice
examples: The symptoms of the disease manifested themselves ten days later.
His nervousness was manifest to all those present.
The anger he felt is manifest in his paintings.

meanings.def: a list of goods or passengers on a ship or an aircraft
